headline: THE CORMORANT AT 55 SOUTH: SILVERSEA UNVEILS ALL PUBLIC SPACES OF HIGHLY ANTICIPATED SOUTHERNMOST HOTEL
summary: Silversea, the leading experiential luxury and expedition travel brand, has unveiled the interior spaces of its new 150-room hotel, The Cormorant at 55 South, in Puerto Williams, Chile, designed to streamline travel to one of the world's most remote destinations, while enhancing the overall guest experience. Set to welcome guests in October 2026, The Cormorant at 55 South, named for its unique location and the resilient seabird, will serve as a cornerstone of Silversea's innovative Antarctica Fl
